An enhanced version of the semi-empirical, spatially distributed
emission and transport model PhosFate implemented in R and C++. It is
based on the D-infinity, but also supports the D8 flow method. The
currently available substances are suspended solids (SS) and particulate
phosphorus (PP). A major feature is the allocation of substance loads
entering surface waters to their sources of origin, which is a basic
requirement for the identification of critical source areas and in
consequence a cost-effective implementation of mitigation measures.

Copyright (C) 2021 RPhosFate authors

This program is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify it
under the terms of the GNU Affero General Public License as published by
the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the License, or (at
your option) any later version.

This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but
WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the GNU Affero
General Public License for more details.

You should have received a copy of the GNU Affero General Public License
along with this program. If not, see <https://www.gnu.org/licenses/>.

## Installation

Install the latest release from CRAN:

`install.packages("RPhosFate")`

[![CRAN
Version](https://www.r-pkg.org/badges/version/RPhosFate)](https://cran.r-project.org/package=RPhosFate)
[![CRAN
Checks](https://badges.cranchecks.info/worst/RPhosFate.svg)](https://cran.r-project.org/web/checks/check_results_RPhosFate.html)

Install the [development
version](https://gisler.github.io/RPhosFate/dev/) from GitHub (requires
[Rtools](https://cran.r-project.org/bin/windows/Rtools/) on Windows and
the `remotes` package):

`remotes::install_github("gisler/RPhosFate")`

[![R build
status](https://github.com/gisler/RPhosFate/workflows/R-CMD-check/badge.svg)](https://github.com/gisler/RPhosFate/actions?query=workflow%3AR-CMD-check)

## Semantic versioning

Releases of this project are versioned following the rules of
[SemVer](https://semver.org).

# Package index

## Input data

- [`DEMrelatedInput()`](https://gisler.github.io/RPhosFate/dev/reference/DEMrelatedInput.md)
  : DEM related input

- [`demoProject()`](https://gisler.github.io/RPhosFate/dev/reference/demoProject.md)
  : Demonstration project

- [`img2tif()`](https://gisler.github.io/RPhosFate/dev/reference/img2tif.md)
  :

  Convert *ERDAS IMAGINE* to *GeoTIFF* raster files

## Project management

- [`RPhosFate()`](https://gisler.github.io/RPhosFate/dev/reference/catchment.md)
  [`catchment()`](https://gisler.github.io/RPhosFate/dev/reference/catchment.md)
  : Initialise project
- [`saveState(`*`<RPhosFate>`*`)`](https://gisler.github.io/RPhosFate/dev/reference/saveState-RPhosFate-method.md)
  : Save state

## High-level interface

- [`firstRun(`*`<RPhosFate>`*`)`](https://gisler.github.io/RPhosFate/dev/reference/firstRun-RPhosFate-method.md)
  : First run
- [`subsequentRun(`*`<RPhosFate>`*`)`](https://gisler.github.io/RPhosFate/dev/reference/subsequentRun-RPhosFate-method.md)
  : Subsequent run
- [`getLayer(`*`<RPhosFate>`*`)`](https://gisler.github.io/RPhosFate/dev/reference/getLayer-RPhosFate-method.md)
  [`` `[`( ``*`<RPhosFate>`*`,`*`<ANY>`*`,`*`<ANY>`*`)`](https://gisler.github.io/RPhosFate/dev/reference/getLayer-RPhosFate-method.md)
  : Get layer
- [`getParameter(`*`<RPhosFate>`*`)`](https://gisler.github.io/RPhosFate/dev/reference/getParameter-RPhosFate-method.md)
  : Get parameter(s)
- [`setParameter(`*`<RPhosFate>`*`)`](https://gisler.github.io/RPhosFate/dev/reference/setParameter-RPhosFate-method.md)
  : Set parameter(s)

## Calibration

- [`snapGauges(`*`<RPhosFate>`*`)`](https://gisler.github.io/RPhosFate/dev/reference/snapGauges-RPhosFate-method.md)
  : Snap gauge(s)
- [`calibrationQuality(`*`<RPhosFate>`*`)`](https://gisler.github.io/RPhosFate/dev/reference/calibrationQuality-RPhosFate-method.md)
  : Calibration quality
- [`autoCalibrate(`*`<RPhosFate>`*`)`](https://gisler.github.io/RPhosFate/dev/reference/autoCalibrate-RPhosFate-method.md)
  : One dimensional automatic model calibration
- [`autoCalibrate2(`*`<RPhosFate>`*`)`](https://gisler.github.io/RPhosFate/dev/reference/autoCalibrate2-RPhosFate-method.md)
  : Two dimensional automatic model calibration

## Low-level interface

- [`erosionPrerequisites(`*`<RPhosFate>`*`)`](https://gisler.github.io/RPhosFate/dev/reference/erosionPrerequisites-RPhosFate-method.md)
  : Erosion prerequisites
- [`erosion(`*`<RPhosFate>`*`)`](https://gisler.github.io/RPhosFate/dev/reference/erosion-RPhosFate-method.md)
  : Erosion
- [`emission(`*`<RPhosFate>`*`)`](https://gisler.github.io/RPhosFate/dev/reference/emission-RPhosFate-method.md)
  : Emission
- [`transportPrerequisites(`*`<RPhosFate>`*`)`](https://gisler.github.io/RPhosFate/dev/reference/transportPrerequisites-RPhosFate-method.md)
  : Transport prerequisites
- [`transport(`*`<RPhosFate>`*`)`](https://gisler.github.io/RPhosFate/dev/reference/transport-RPhosFate-method.md)
  : Transport

## Class description

- [`RPhosFate-class`](https://gisler.github.io/RPhosFate/dev/reference/RPhosFate-class.md)
  : RPhosFate class
